document_data.name: Pangaea
document_data.mainbody: '''Pangaea''' was a world—far removed from [[Toril]]—that was known mainly for its relation to the [[wizard]] [[Prismal the Outrageous]] and the [[Chemcheaux (business)|Chemcheaux magic shops]]. The main method of travel between Toril and Pangaea was via the ''[[Chemcheaux Teleport Pad]]'' kept in the back room of each Chemcheaux location.
document_data.Locations:
* [[Electropolis]], a major city and home of the [[Chemcheaux 1]] shop.
* [[Chamshaea]], another city on Pangaea.
document_data.Inhabitants:
* [[Mortimar (Pangaea)|Mortimar]], Prismal's traitorous business partner.
* [[Prismal the Outrageous]], an author and entrepreneur.
* [[Rhodhan]], Prismal's companion and employee.
